data.text: “Nanso seesei wɔsere me,
Mfasoɔ bɛn na wɔn nsa mu ahoɔden wɔ ma me,
Ohia ne ɛkɔm ama wɔn ho atete,
Wɔboaboaa nkyenhahan ano wɔ nkyɛkyerɛ mu,
Wɔn mfɛfoɔ pamoo wɔn firii wɔn mu,
Wɔhyɛɛ wɔn ma wɔtenaa nsuka a emu awo,
Wɔsuu sɛ mfunumu wɔ wiram
Ekuo a wɔmfra na wɔnni din,
“Na ɛnnɛ yi wɔn mmammarima de dwom bɔ me akutia;
Wɔkyiri me na wɔnnka mma me ho;
Afei a Onyankopɔn abubu me tadua na ɔde amanehunu aba me so yi,
Abusuakuo no to hyɛ me so wɔ me nifa so;
Wɔsisi mʼakwan;
Wɔba te sɛ deɛ wɔfiri ntokuro a ano abae mu;
Ahunahuna ma me ho dwiri me;
“Na seesei, me nkwa resa;
Anadwo wowɔ me nnompe mu;
Onyankopɔn firi ne tumi mu yɛ sɛ aduradeɛ ma me;
Ɔto me twene atɛkyɛ mu
“Ao Onyankopɔn, mesu mefrɛ wo, nanso wommua me.
Woba me so anibereɛ so;
Wohwim me na wode mframa pia me;
Menim sɛ wode me bɛkɔ owuo mu,
“Ampa ara obiara mfa ne nsa nka onipa a ɔrebrɛ
Mansu amma wɔn a wɔwɔ ɔhaw mu anaa?
Nanso ɛberɛ a mʼani da papa so no, bɔne baeɛ;
Meyafunu mu a ɛwowɔ me no nnyae da;
Menenam a mabiri a ɛnyɛ sɛ owia na ahye me;
Madane nnompo nuabarima,
Me honam ani abiri na ɛhwanehwane;
Me sankuo bɔ kwadwom,
